page.title: 14TRANSPORT
page.content: OUR AREA IS VERY WELL SERVED BY BOTH PUBLIC AND PRIVATE TRANSPORT. THE PRINCIPAL ROUTES OF THE BLOCK ARE A345 A338, A360 AND THE STRATFORD ROAD THROUGH THE WOODFORD VALLEY. THE A345 IS THE BUSIEST ROAD DURING THE DAYTIME BECAUSE IT IS THE MAIN ROAD FROM SALISBURY TO AMESBURY AND THEREFORE LINKS UP WITH THE A303 AND ALL ROADS TO THE NORTH AND WEST. IT IS ALSO A MAJOR ROUTE TO THE MOTORWAYS LEADING TO WALES AND THE NORTH OF ENGLAND. BUS SERVICES THROUGH THE AREA ARE ADEQUATE BUT THERE IS A POOR SERVICE FOR PEOPLE LIVING IN THE WOODFORD VALLEY. THE NEAREST RAILWAY STATION IS AT SALISBURY AND IS WITHIN REACH OF ALL PARTS OF OUR BLOCK. SALISBURY LINKS WITH ALL OTHER PARTS OF THE COUNTRY AND THERE IS A FREQUENT RAIL SERVICE TO LONDON.
